##### <a name="-prosody--use_libevent"></a>`use_libevent`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`

use libevent for keeping track of network connections
this parameter is deprecated, in favor of
network_backend (use options to set value)

##### <a name="-prosody--daemonize"></a>`daemonize`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`

if the server should be sent to background or not
deprecated since prosody version 0.12

##### <a name="-prosody--admins"></a>`admins`

Data type: `Array[String]`



##### <a name="-prosody--allow_registration"></a>`allow_registration`

Data type: `Boolean`



##### <a name="-prosody--authentication"></a>`authentication`

Data type: `Enum['internal_plain', 'internal_hashed', 'cyrus', 'anonymous', 'ha1', 'ldap']`



##### <a name="-prosody--c2s_require_encryption"></a>`c2s_require_encryption`

Data type: `Boolean`

##### <a name="-prosody--community_modules--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum[present, latest]`



##### <a name="-prosody--community_modules--path"></a>`path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



##### <a name="-prosody--community_modules--source"></a>`source`

Data type: `String`

Data type: `Enum['hg', 'git']`

### <a name="prosody--user"></a>`prosody::user`

Manage prosody users

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `prosody::user` defined type:

* [`pass`](#-prosody--user--pass)
* [`host`](#-prosody--user--host)
* [`purge`](#-prosody--user--purge)

##### <a name="-prosody--user--pass"></a>`pass`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-prosody--user--host"></a>`host`

Data type: `Variant[Pattern[/^localhost $/], Stdlib::Host]`



Default value: `'localhost'`

##### <a name="-prosody--user--purge"></a>`purge`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

## Data types

### <a name="Prosody--Loglevel"></a>`Prosody::Loglevel`

The Prosody::Loglevel data type.

Alias of `Enum['debug', 'info', 'warn', 'error']`
